# 心术全书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xinshu-quanshu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xinshu-quanshu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xinshu-quanshu
xinshu-quanshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xinshu-quanshu
xinshu-quanshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
